Name: TPie
Author: Tischel
Description: Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets, Macros and more...
Changelog:
# 1.8.2.0

- The Escape key can now be used to close a ring with a toggable keybind.
- Added a setting for rings with toggable keybinds to not execute the hovered action when closed.
